contents.text: Thank you for calling Ejento, your talent acquisition partner for the startup era in San Francisco.
If you are a candidate looking for new opportunities, press 1.
To speak with a recruitment specialist about open positions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruitment specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly explore relevant job openings in SF startups
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about tech startup roles that value my military experience.
I’d like to sync with a recruitment specialist about current job openings and pipeline fit.
I’d like to speak with a recruitment specialist about open positions that suit my experience.
I'm seeking new graduate physics positions at SF startups and need to speak with a recruiter.

contents.text: For resume advice and interview preparation tips, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our candidate support team.

navigationGoals: Get targeted feedback on my resume and interview prep
I need resume feedback and interview coaching for transitioning from the military into civilian tech jobs.
I need advanced resume optimization and mock interview calibration with your support team.
I need help updating my resume and getting tips for upcoming interviews.
I want tips on improving my physics resume and interview technique.

contents.text: If you are a client seeking to build your startup team, press 2.
To discuss your hiring needs with a talent advisor, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a talent advisor.

navigationGoals: Discuss my startup’s hiring requirements and timeline with a talent advisor
I want to discuss my startup’s hiring needs with a talent advisor to build my team.
I want to consult on our startup’s technical hiring strategy and resource planning.
I’m looking to discuss my startup’s hiring needs with a talent advisor.
I need to discuss hiring an engineer for my early-stage physics startup.

contents.text: For details on our executive search and leadership placement services, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve information on our executive search services.

navigationGoals: Learn about executive search services and leadership placement options
I need details on executive search services to help me recruit senior leadership for my new company.
I’m looking for detailed info on your executive search frameworks and leadership placement process.
I want information on your executive search and leadership placement services.
I’m looking for leadership placement options to find a CTO for my research venture.
